EmailTemplate.name: Request to Grant Login Access
EmailTemplate.subject: Please grant login access to your Salesforce Team
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In your Welcome to VinSolutions email we requested you grant login access to your Salesforce Administrators, at this time you have not completed this request. Please grant access immediately.
1. After logging into Salesforce.com, click on your name at the top right and select Setup from the dropdown menu. 2. Under the My Personal Information section, click "Grant login access to your administrator or salesforce.com Customer Support" 3. Change the bottom date associated with granting access to your administrator to expire in 1 year and click the Save button.
If you have any questions please email me.
Thank you, Software Salesforce Group
